title: Day 359  (Peter 1-3, Jude 1) - Year 2

description:
SHOW NOTES:

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- John 21:18-19

- Matthew 13:55

- Article: What is the Book of Enoch and should it be in the Bible?

- Video: 1, 2, 3 John Overview

- The Bible Recap - Start!
